styles.css: & { position: relative; padding-bottom: var(--wp--preset--spacing--20); } &::before { content: ''; position: absolute; left: 0; bottom: 0; height: 5px; width: 55px; background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--primary); } &::after { content: ''; position: absolute; left: 0; bottom: 2px; height: 1px; width: 95%; max-width: 255px; background-color: var(--wp--preset--color--primary); }
